name: Fashion PopStar City – World of Design & Luxury Celebrity Shopping
name_original: Fashion PopStar City – World of Design & Luxury Celebrity Shopping
description:

- ONE OF THE TOP APPS OF 2013
- TOP 10 WORLDWIDE


AWESOME STYLISH FASHION PACKED ENDLESS FUN!

Are you a "Fashionista"? Express your style by working your way to owning your very own fashion boutique.

The more you work - the more you can shop - all while gaining VIP Status!

Fashion Girl Popstar lets you create your own avatar where get to choose different hairstyles, makeup applications, fashion styles and accessories. The sale notifying feature is every girls dream come true find out when items go on sale and never pay full price again!

Experience celebrity and popstar treatment you get to shop in chic boutiques and have your very own personal fashion consultant by your side.

Let your creativity flow design your own look and share with friends on facebook, twitter, or by email.

CHECK IT OUT FOR FREE NOW
